channel.title: Reaperscape help
channel.description:
hey i dled reaperscape that i love but i there is only client.class and no client.java :( does anyone have any ideas?
and if i run th server it comes up with Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Reaperscape help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It can’t locate the server class, not the client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Reaperscape help
item.dc:creator: @Human Human
item.description:
@Human wrote:

hey i dled reaperscape that i love but i there is only client.class and no client.java does anyone have any ideas?

and if i run th server it comes up with Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)

Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.
